document_data.mainbody:
ensers were religious items in the Realms often carried by clerics who used them like portable braziers to burn incense.
Censers were commonly made from brass, silver, or gold and decorated in a variety of fashions. Most could hold up to  of incense at one time.
These items were available for purchase through Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue for 1 gold piece to 5 gold pieces depending on the material.
* Censers were favored by clerics and priests.
